description:
This is a union view of the following OR management system log panel timing information-related tables:


OR_LOG_PANEL_TIME1 - contains log panel timing information for the first panel.


OR_LOG_PANEL_TIME2 - contains log panel timing information for the second panel.


OR_LOG_PANEL_TIME3 - contains log panel timing information for the third panel.


OR_LOG_PANEL_TIME4 - contains log panel timing information for the fourth panel.


OR_LOG_PANEL_TIME5 - contains log panel timing information for the fifth panel.

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the surgical log the panel time refers to.

columns.name: PANEL_NUMBER
columns.description: The panel number in the surgical log.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of the panel time in the surgical log.

columns.name: PANEL_TIME_EVENT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The event set up to take place in a panel in the surgical log.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: PANEL_START_TIME
columns.description: The date and time the event began in the surgical log.

columns.name: PANEL_END_TIME
columns.description: The date and time the event ended in the surgical log.

columns.name: PANEL_EVENT_ELPSD
columns.description: Indicates the total amount of time for the event in the surgical log.

columns.name: PANEL_PROC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the surgical procedure, if this event is associated with a particular procedure.

columns.name: PANEL_PROC_ID_PROC_NAME
columns.description: The name of the surgical procedure record.

columns.name: PANEL_EVENT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The panel level event. This line will be blank when a procedure level event was documented.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PANEL_TIME_EVENT_C_NAME

columns.name: PROCEDURE_EVENT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The procedure level event. This line will be blank when a panel level event was documented.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PANEL_TIME_EVENT_C_NAME

columns.name: INST_PNL_INTER_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Instant of update for an event in a panel. This will be used for Event Interval functionality.
